metadata.name: this is a spellbook, a spellbook
metadata.description:
the principles of necronometry in the entire multiverse, the source of necronometry.



Chen Mo, as the user of the book, can obtain knowledge from the book through the emerald, and directly transfer the knowledge to his mind.



Second, it was the book that caused his journey, and it wasn't a one-off.



There is always a transworld Teleport in the spellbook. This spell transports Chen Mo to a new world and records his coordinates, allowing him to travel between countless worlds.
